323.name: Stone Fence
323.description: Lasts longer than a wood fence.

324.name: Iron Fence
324.description: Lasts longer than a stone fence.

298.name: Hardwood Fence
298.description: The most durable type of fence.

297.name: Grass Starter
297.description: Place this on your farm to start a new patch of grass.

325.name: Gate
325.description: Allows you to pass through a fence.

130.name: Chest
130.description: A place to store your items.

93.name: Torch
93.description: Provides a modest amount of light.

8.name: Scarecrow
8.description: Prevents crows from attacking your crops. Has a limited radius (about 8 "tiles").

167.name: Deluxe Scarecrow
167.description: Prevents crows from attacking your crops. Has a large radius (about 16 "tiles").

10.name: Bee House
10.description: Place outside and wait for delicious honey! (Except in Winter).

12.name: Keg
12.description: Place a fruit or vegetable in here. Eventually it will turn into a beverage.

163.name: Cask
163.description: Use in the cellar to age products like wine and cheese.

13.name: Furnace
13.description: Turns ore and coal into metal bars.

62.name: Garden Pot
62.description: Grows crops from any season when indoors. Outdoors, it can only house seasonal crops.
62.unlockConditions: Evelyn cutscene after completing the Greenhouse

37.name: Wood Sign
37.description: Use an item on this to change what's displayed. The item won't be consumed.

38.name: Stone Sign
38.description: Use an item on this to change what's displayed. The item won't be consumed.

25.name: Seed Maker
25.description: Place crops inside to produce a varying amount of seeds. Doesn't work with fruit tree crops.

17.name: Loom
17.description: Turns raw wool into fine cloth.

154.name: Worm Bin
154.description: Produces bait on a regular basis. The worms are self-sufficient.

15.name: Preserves Jar
15.description: Turns vegetables into pickles and fruit into jam.

114.name: Charcoal Kiln
114.description: Turns 10 pieces of wood into one piece of coal.

105.name: Tapper
105.description: Place on a maple, oak, or pine tree and wait for the reservoir to fill with product!

9.name: Lightning Rod
9.description: Collects energy from lightning storms and turns it into battery packs.

156.name: Slime Incubator
156.description: Hatches slimes eggs into slimes. Allows you to raise slimes outdoors.

158.name: Slime Egg-Press
158.description: Compresses 100 pieces of slime into a slime egg. It's a miracle of science!

21.name: Crystalarium
21.description: Insert a gem of your choice and it will grow copies.

209.name: Mini-Jukebox
209.description: Allows you to play your favorite tunes.

599.name: Sprinkler
599.description: Waters the 4 adjacent tiles every morning.

621.name: Quality Sprinkler
621.description: Waters the 8 adjacent tiles every morning.

645.name: Iridium Sprinkler
645.description: Waters the 24 adjacent tiles every morning.

71.name: Staircase
71.description: Use this to move down a level in the mines.

464.name: Flute Block
464.description: Plays a flute sound when you walk past.

463.name: Drum Block
463.description: Plays a drum sound when you walk past.

368.name: Basic Fertilizer
368.description: Improves soil quality a little, increasing your chance to grow quality crops. Mix into tilled soil.

805.name: Tree Fertilizer
805.description: Sprinkle on a wild tree to ensure rapid growth, even in winter. Doesn't work on fruit trees.

369.name: Quality Fertilizer
369.description: Improves soil quality, increasing your chance to grow quality crops. Mix into tilled soil.

370.name: Basic Retaining Soil
370.description: This soil has a chance of staying watered overnight. Mix into tilled soil.

371.name: Quality Retaining Soil
371.description: This soil has a good chance of staying watered overnight. Mix into tilled soil.

465.name: Speed-Gro
465.description: Stimulates leaf production. Guaranteed to increase growth rate by at least 10%. Mix into tilled soil.

466.name: Deluxe Speed-Gro
466.description: Stimulates leaf production. Guaranteed to increase growth rate by at least 25%. Mix into tilled soil.

918.name: Hyper Speed-Gro
918.description: Greatly stimulates leaf production. Guaranteed to increase growth rate by at least 33%. Mix into tilled soil.
918.unlockConditions: Qi's Walnut Room for 30 Qi Gems

919.name: Deluxe Fertilizer
919.description: Greatly improves soil quality, increasing your chance to grow quality crops. Mix into tilled soil.

920.name: Deluxe Retaining Soil
920.description: This soil has a 100% chance of staying watered overnight. Mix into tilled soil.

286.name: Cherry Bomb
286.description: Generates a small explosion. Stand back!

288.name: Mega Bomb
288.description: Generates a powerful explosion. Use with extreme caution.

499.name: Ancient Seeds
499.unlockConditions: Donating Ancient Seed artifact to Museum

495.name: Wild Seeds (Sp)
495.description: An assortment of wild spring seeds.

496.name: Wild Seeds (Su)
496.description: An assortment of wild summer seeds.

497.name: Wild Seeds (Fa)
497.description: An assortment of wild fall seeds.

498.name: Wild Seeds (Wi)
498.description: An assortment of wild winter seeds.

885.name: Fiber Seeds
885.description: Plant these in any season. Does not require watering. Harvest with the scythe. Takes 7 days to grow.

251.name: Tea Sapling
251.description: Takes 20 days to mature. Produces tea leaves during the final week of each season, except winter. No watering necessary!
251.unlockConditions: Mail the day after Caroline's 2-heart event.

688.name: Warp Totem: Farm
688.description: Warp directly to your house. Consumed on use.

689.name: Warp Totem: Mountains
689.description: Warp directly to the mountains. Consumed on use.

690.name: Warp Totem: Beach
690.description: Warp directly to the beach. Consumed on use.

261.name: Warp Totem: Desert
261.description: Warp directly to Calico Desert. Consumed on use.

886.name: Warp Totem: Island
886.description: Warp directly to Ginger Island. Consumed on use.

681.name: Rain Totem
681.description: Activate to greatly increase the chance for rain tomorrow. Consumed on use.

926.name: Cookout Kit
926.description: Use this to create a cooking campfire, allowing you to cook on-the-go!

403.name: Field Snack
403.description: A quick snack to fuel the hungry forager.

328.name: Wood Floor
328.description: Place on the ground to create paths or to decorate your floors.

401.name: Straw Floor
401.description: Place on the ground to create paths or to spruce up your floors.

331.name: Weathered Floor
331.description: Place on the ground to create paths or to spruce up your floors.

840.name: Rustic Plank Floor
840.description: Place on the ground to create paths or to decorate your floors.

333.name: Crystal Floor
333.description: Place on the ground to create paths or to spruce up your floors.

329.name: Stone Floor
329.description: Place on the ground to create paths or to spruce up your floors.

841.name: Stone Walkway Floor
841.description: Place on the ground to create paths or to decorate your floors.

293.name: Brick Floor
293.description: Place on the ground to create paths or to decorate your floors.

405.name: Wood Path
405.description: Place on the ground to create paths or to spruce up your floors.

407.name: Gravel Path
407.description: Place on the ground to create paths or to spruce up your floors.

411.name: Cobblestone Path
411.description: Place on the ground to create paths or to spruce up your floors.

415.name: Stepping Stone Path
415.description: Place on the ground to create paths or to spruce up your floors.

409.name: Crystal Path
409.description: Place on the ground to create paths or to spruce up your floors.

774.name: Wild Bait
774.description: A unique recipe from Linus that gives you a chance to catch two fish at once.

685.name: Bait
685.description: Causes fish to bite faster. Must first be attached to a fishing rod.

686.name: Spinner
686.description: The shape makes it spin around in the water. Slightly increases the bite-rate when fishing.

703.name: Magnet
703.description: Increases the chance of finding treasures when fishing. However, fish aren't crazy about the taste.

694.name: Trap Bobber
694.description: Causes fish to escape slower when you aren't reeling them in.

695.name: Cork Bobber
695.description: Slightly increases the size of your "fishing bar".

687.name: Dressed Spinner
687.description: The metal tab and colorful streamers create an enticing spectacle for fish. Increases the bite-rate when fishing.

693.name: Treasure Hunter
693.description: Fish don't escape while collecting treasures. Also slightly increases the chance to find treasures.

691.name: Barbed Hook
691.description: Makes your catch more secure, causing the "fishing bar" to cling to your catch. Works best on slow, weak fish.

772.name: Oil of Garlic
772.description: Drink this and weaker monsters will avoid you.

710.name: Crab Pot
710.description: Place it in the water, load it with bait, and check the next day to see if you've caught anything. Works in streams, lakes, and the ocean.

527.name: Iridium Band
527.description: Glows, attracts items, and increases attack damage by 10%.

524.name: Ring of Yoba
524.description: Occasionally shields the wearer from damage.

525.name: Sturdy Ring
525.description: Cuts the duration of negative status effects in half.

521.name: Warrior Ring
521.description: Occasionally infuses the wearer with "warrior energy" after slaying a monster.

108.name: Tub o' Flowers
108.description: Flowers planted in an oak barrel. Blooms in spring and summer.

143.name: Wooden Brazier
143.description: Provides a moderate amount of light.

83.name: Wicked Statue
83.description: There's something unsettling about the looks of this statue.

144.name: Stone Brazier
144.description: Provides a moderate amount of light.

145.name: Gold Brazier
145.description: Provides a moderate amount of light.

146.name: Campfire
146.description: Provides a moderate amount of light.

147.name: Stump Brazier
147.description: Provides a moderate amount of light.

148.name: Carved Brazier
148.description: Provides a moderate amount of light.

149.name: Skull Brazier
149.description: Provides a moderate amount of light.

150.name: Barrel Brazier
150.description: Provides a moderate amount of light.

151.name: Marble Brazier
151.description: Provides a moderate amount of light.

152.name: Wood Lamp-post
152.description: Provides a good amount of light.

153.name: Iron Lamp-post
153.description: Provides a good amount of light.

872.name: Fairy Dust
872.description: Sprinkle on kegs, furnaces, and other refining equipment to instantly receive their product.

874.name: Bug Steak
874.description: The last resort of the hungry cave diver.

39.name: Dark Sign
39.description: Use an item on this to change what's displayed. The item won't be consumed.

877.name: Quality Bobber
877.description: Boosts the quality of fish that you catch.

232.name: Stone Chest
232.description: A place to store your items.

879.name: Monster Musk
879.description: Spray this on to draw more monsters out of hiding.

238.name: Mini-Obelisk
238.description: Place two on the farm to warp between them.

239.name: Farm Computer
239.description: Scans the farm and displays useful information.

254.name: Ostrich Incubator
254.description: Hatches ostrich eggs into baby ostriches. Place in a barn.

182.name: Geode Crusher
182.description: Breaks geodes open automatically. Requires coal to operate.

231.name: Solar Panel
231.description: Slowly generates batteries when left in the sun.

839.name: Thorns Ring
839.description: When enemies damage you, they will take damage themselves.

888.name: Glowstone Ring
888.description: Emits a constant light, and also increases your radius for collecting items.

264.name: Heavy Tapper
264.description: Place on a maple, oak, or pine tree and wait for the reservoir to fill with product! Works twice as fast as a normal tapper.
264.unlockConditions: Qi's Secret Walnut Room for 20 Qi Gems

275.name: Hopper
275.description: Items placed inside will automatically be loaded into the machine in front of it.
275.unlockConditions: Qi's Walnut Room for 50 Qi Gems

908.name: Magic Bait
908.description: Allows you to catch fish from any season, time, or weather, from whichever type of water you cast into.
908.unlockConditions: Qi's Walnut Room for 20 Qi Gems
